Title: Making CSS saner (from Patrick of Auctomatic)

Author: kyro
Content:
Yeah. However, I don't think one should be discouraged to start a ringtone service just because there are all these commercials floating around. In my opinion, and in many others', most of these commercials come across as incredibly cheesy and one can tell from the first 3 opening seconds that amidst the cheesiness lies a huge scam.

I'd say the only company who has tried to pull this off and come across as legit is MTV.

I don't like cheese.
